% !TeX root = ../../main.tex

\newcommand{\mirrorvert}[2]{\raisebox{\depth}{\scalebox{#1}[-#1]{$#2$}}}

\newcommand{\rom}[1]{\romannumeral #1}
\newcommand{\romcap}[1]{\MakeUppercase{\rom{#1}}}

\newcommand{\tightoverset}[2]{\mathop{#2}\limits^{\vbox to -.5ex{\kern-0.75ex\hbox{$#1$}\vss}}}
\newcommand{\tightunderset}[2]{\mathop{#2}\limits_{\vbox to .5ex{\kern-1.1ex\hbox{$#1$}\vss}}}

\newcommand{\perpclip}{\scalebox{0.6}{\clipbox{0pt 0pt 0pt 4.5pt}{$\perp$}}}
\newcommand*\smashstackrel[3][lr]{\mathrel{\smashoperator[#1]{\mathop{#3}^{#2}}}}
